api_list.name: Get All
api_list.description: get all currencies and values in comparation with the USA Dollar.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-currencies.p.rapidapi.com/get"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-currencies.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Historical Graph
api_list.description: Get historical graph comparison between two currencies.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-currencies.p.rapidapi.com/api/historical_for_graph/{is_from}/{to}/{days}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-currencies.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
